title: New SCOTUS Term Begins as LEFT Continues Attacks
itunes:title: New SCOTUS Term Begins as LEFT Continues Attacks
description: The U.S. Supreme Court begins their Fall term today and the Left has resumed their all-out assault on the Court's legitimacy. Jay, Jordan, and the Sekulow team break down the cases the Court will hear as well as the reactions the Court's resumption by the radical Left.
content:encoded: The U.S. Supreme Court begins their Fall term today and the Left has resumed their all-out assault on the Court's legitimacy. Jay, Jordan, and the Sekulow team break down the cases the Court will hear as well as the reactions the Court's resumption by the radical Left.

itunes:author: Jay Sekulow
